By using this software, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, please do not install or use this software.

2. License and Restrictions
You are granted only a non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use this software.

Decompiling, reverse engineering, or any other attempts to obtain source code are prohibited.

Decompiling, reverse engineering, or any other attempts to obtain source code are prohibited.

Using for illegal activities, attacking other systems, or abusing platform resources is prohibited.

3. Software Components and Third-Party Tools
This installation package includes and downloads third-party tools such as Docker and WireGuard. Use of these tools must comply with their original licensing terms.

The platform is not responsible for any issues or damage caused by third-party tools.

4. Resource Usage Notice
This software may utilize your device's CPU, GPU, memory, and network bandwidth to participate in distributed computing.

If you choose to enable this feature, you agree to this resource usage and understand that it may affect your device's performance.

5. Data Collection and Privacy
This software may collect necessary device identifiers and operation logs to improve the service.

Unless otherwise expressly stated, you agree that this software will not collect personally identifiable information.

User information will be handled in accordance with the Privacy Policy.

6. Limitation of Liability
The platform assumes no liability for any data loss, hardware damage, system failures, or other indirect losses resulting from the use of this software.

This software is provided "as is" and is not guaranteed to be functionally complete, stable, or error-free.

7. Termination and Prohibition of Use
If you are found to have violated these Terms, the platform reserves the right to terminate the license and block user access.

8. Amendments to Terms
The platform reserves the right to update these Terms at any time. Your continued use of the software after such update constitutes your agreement to the revised terms.

9. Governing Law and Dispute Resolution
These Terms shall be governed by the laws of the Republic of China, and the Taiwan District Court shall be the court of first instance.
